Reviews.Title: The good, the bad, the bottom line
Reviews.Author: Horacio Villarreal "Ecadese"
Reviews.Content: The Good:*This phone is durable: its been dropped (one too many times) and wet and has still lasted me a good two years or so.*I text a lot on this phone and it comes with T9 English.*Also, has a decent camera in which you can send shots to an email.*Can go on the internet to a certain extent through the phone (T-Zones).  You can only access very few sites without paying though.*Comes with "Forgotten Warrior," a game which is surprisingly fun and I have beaten in just about every way possible.*Has an audio voice recorder which I have not used much, but its there (not good for recording ringtones)*Also, AIM is very usable.*Good alarm clock that usually wakes me up.*Long battery life, hasn't seem to have lost a charge even after 2 years.*Camera can be used with the phone open or closed. (flipped or unflipped).*Loud speaker phone.*Password protection to start phoneThe Bad:*Its a flip phone and flip phones are way out of style and not attractive.*Not a lot of memory, deleting texts to free up room can seem like a constant struggle.*Small screen compared to newer phones.*Can feel big and bulky compared to newer phones.*If texting, a lot of words have to be defined and or typed out manually.The bottom line:Good cheap phone to start out with.  Has all the basic features of newer, more stylish phones.  It is very durable (I dont think I could break it if I tried).  If you don't want to risk getting a new phone lost, stolen, or broken and are looking for a low tech phone, try this.  For 90 dollars it is not worth it but if you can get it at a cheaper price (Around 20) elsewhere, it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Decent Phone for Just Making Calls
Reviews.Author: Phoenix Rising "A permanent work in progress..."
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I've had. It doesn't have too much in the way of 'bells and whistles' but if you just need a phone to make calls or send text messages, this one does just fine. The volume could be a bit louder, otherwise it's just a decent phone.

Reviews.Title: I should have never brough this phone.
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: Hello, if you are thinking about buying this phone because it is unlocked, you are making a very big mistake. When I brought this phone I thought that it was going to receive a unlocked Samsung T229 phone; however, when I received it it was locked. I should have never brought this phone from this seller because the phone was suppose to be unlocked and it was locked. Now, I have to spend extra money to unlock that phone.  I will never buy anything else from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Samsung T229
Reviews.Author: donald hart
Reviews.Content: I love Sansumg. This phone is a small, but very good, I can move home from one place to another and the signal always arrives well. Again'll buy Sansumg and seller for good service.I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Model ususallygreat, but not one sold BY OEM Shop
Reviews.Author: Travel4fun
Reviews.Content: Never buy from OEM shop: please do make a through search on Google, and you will see OEM has a long record of sending out counterfeit or non-functioning items (e.g. made in China, when a careful review shows that the real OEM would have been manufactured in Japan or another country).I found this phone through other vendors. Amazon is great, but NOT the OEM shop: it has a long and sordid history of refusing to refund or resolve any problems with defective items it sells. In the long run, you'll save money shopping with any another vendor (either through Amazon, or another on-line seller).

Reviews.Title: Samsung T229 GSM Cell Phone Unlocked
Reviews.Content: Happy with the phone. When the phone arrived there was a problem with the battery. It wouldn't hold a charge. Contacted the seller and they sent a new battery but it took a week and a half to get it here.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: viper
Reviews.Content: We love this phone simple to use easy to navigate even without reading the manual and it works overseas  Love it

Reviews.Title: Samsung unlocked cell phone
Reviews.Author: R. A. Macgregor "StreetRod"
Reviews.Content: I bought this cute little cell phone to replace my wife's clunky old, poor performing Nokia. This phone does all that it needs to do for a great price, and does it well.I'd have rated it 5 stars if not for the poor camera function of the phone. Still, it is a basic, cute little model.R

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: uhhh IDK
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with this product I dont know if it worked for my mother in law who lives in Jamaica but from what I saw I was happy.

Reviews.Title: Cheap phone
Reviews.Author: Clipityclop
Reviews.Content: A classic tale of you get what you pay for. I needed a phone to give to my grandson, who seems to have trouble keeping up with his, and it does send and receive calls but that's it.
